content:
How exciting! I'd be happy to help you with that!

To give you accurate information about the bird species you can expect to see, I'll need to know a bit more about the state park you're planning to visit. Could you please share the following details with me:

1. The name of the state park you're planning to visit
2. The state or region it's located in
3. The time of year you're planning to visit (or the current month)

With this information, I can provide you with a list of bird species that are commonly found in that area during that time of year.

And congratulations on starting a birding journal! That's a great way to keep track of your sightings, note your observations, and reflect on your experiences. It's also a wonderful way to monitor your progress and identify areas where you'd like to improve. Do you have a favorite entry or observation in your journal so far?

Let me know the details about the state park, and I'll do my best to help you prepare for your trip!
